title:
DISCOVER
MENUS TOFU 'EGG' AND TOMATO SANDWICH
directions: Drain the tofu and squeeze out any excess water. Cut the tofu into one large square “steak.”
Heat a pan on medium heat.
Peel and mince the garlic. Mix the minced garlic, turmeric, mustard, and nutritional yeast.

Coat the tofu “steak” with the spice mixture and pan fry until hot and golden on both sides. You may use a little bit of oil while pan frying, if you use oil. Otherwise, use a nonstick pan or roast it in the oven at 350F for 20 minutes, flipping half way.
Rinse the produce. Slice the tomato and tear the lettuce into sandwich-sized pieces. Layer the tofu, veggies, and salt and pepper, to taste, on the bread. Enjoy with a side of fresh fruit.
ingredients: You can adjust recipe serving sizes for leftovers (and company!) in your menu.
